actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to defer repayment of municipal and industrial costs of the Dickinson Unit.

summary.text: Amends the Reclamation Authorization Act of 1975 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to defer repayment of municipal and industrial water supply costs of the Dickinson Unit, North Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to defer repayment of municipal and industrial costs of the Dickinson Unit.
